titleNullable: Song Lyrics from Jay Chou's Greatest Works Of Art
subtitleNullable: Lyrics of the songs from 2022's best selling album globally
descriptionNullable:
"Greatest Works of Art" is Mandopop Singer Jay Chou's 15th studio album released on July 15, 2022, and also his first since 2016, a six year gap. 

It was the best selling album in 2022 worldwide and holds the record for highest first-week sales, selling five million copies upon release in China in July 2022.

References:
https://www.bandwagon.asia/articles/jay-chou-bts-stray-kids-seventeen-top-selling-albums-in-the-world-ifpi-global-charts-2022
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greatest_Works_of_Art

Feel free to use this dataset for any text mining/NLP tasks in a different language other than English! An example is shown in this notebook (https://www.kaggle.com/yeoyunsianggeremie/jay-chou-s-15th-album-lyrics-english-translation ), where I experimented with translating the lyrics to English)
title: Song Lyrics from Jay Chou's Greatest Works Of Art
subtitle: Lyrics of the songs from 2022's best selling album globally
description:
"Greatest Works of Art" is Mandopop Singer Jay Chou's 15th studio album released on July 15, 2022, and also his first since 2016, a six year gap. 

It was the best selling album in 2022 worldwide and holds the record for highest first-week sales, selling five million copies upon release in China in July 2022.

References:
https://www.bandwagon.asia/articles/jay-chou-bts-stray-kids-seventeen-top-selling-albums-in-the-world-ifpi-global-charts-2022
